structure.unit: KENTUCKY ALCOHOL AND OTHER DRUG ABUSE PREVENTION, INTERVENTION, AND TREATMENT LAW

law.catch_line: Conditions requiring exclusion of consideration for state funds.
law.text:
Chemical dependency treatment programs shall not be considered for receipt of state funds if they:
Do not submit reports as required by KRS 222.460; or
Do not cooperate in the submission of information that would allow the cabinet to conduct a scientific random sample survey of client-outcome indicators as required by KRS 222.465.
law.history: Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 334, sec. 14, effective July 15, 1994. -- Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 254, sec. 3, effective July 13,1990.
